top_comments.comment:
I'd been watching many reactions about this cover song of JK.
Blake has the most precise reaction when it comes to musical aspect.
Good job!

comments_since_last_sample.body: i am falling for jungkook for real !

I'm so in love with these comments here, I never usually see the army comments because I'm not a part of the fandom, but you guys sound as loving and respectful - and objective! - as harries and directioners, because we say pretty much the same things when Harry makes a cover)) Somehow it's endearing because love to your favourite artist is a universal thing so we all - all many millions of us share the same emotion. Wow. Now I know those 7 hardworking talented boys are in good hands <3
Bellísima voz tiene Jungkook tan angelical la amo 💜🎵🎶✨😍

Nothing will ever beat the original for me, it's just how I usually view covers, the original artist, especially when they're the author of the song, always is one step ahead of the cover artist. But Jung Kook did this song justice for sure. I loved this cover so much! It's way better than Little Mix's imo.
So beautiful! And That baby is adorable!
I do enjoyed you're reaction the way you break it down to the tiny details of the note and instruments and I'm learning at the same time .I thank you
thank you so much for taking care of jungkook
UR PET KITTY IS SO CUTE OMG
im kinda just watching the cat tbh
